title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2212.2 - Award recipient and institutional responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2212.2 - Award recipient and institutional responsibilities

State Regulations

The provisions set forth in Part 2204 of this Title shall
apply to award recipients and institutions which they attend while receiving
awards pursuant to this Part. In addition to the certification procedures set
forth in section
2205.3
of this Title, an
institution, in certifying the eligibility of a recipient of an award under
this section shall report to the corporation the recipient's cost of
attendance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2212.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
